definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: He went back home loaded down with parcels and packages.
sentences.chinese: 他提着大包小包回了家。

sentences.english: In this study microwave was used to sterilize and preserve laver.
sentences.chinese: 利用微波能对小包装紫菜进行杀菌保鲜研究。

sentences.english: I see a 'sack' which appeared to contain a liquid.
sentences.chinese: 我看见里面有一个亮晶晶的小包包，充满着液体。

sentences.english: If you like, add a dash of low fat milk and a single packet of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢，可以放入少许低脂牛奶或者一小包糖。

sentences.english: Next to the CD case are two straws and two little black packets.
sentences.chinese: CD盒旁边有两根吸管和两个黑色小包。

sentences.english: Several small masses cold be connected each other to become one big mass.
sentences.chinese: 或数个小包块连结成一个大包块。

sentences.english: Because in its scramble to reach the nectar, a whole bundle of pollen-packets sticks to the wasp between its feelers.
sentences.chinese: 因为黄蜂寻找花蜜时，触角之间会粘上一小包花粉。

sentences.english: I  packed the jackets and  rackets into  packets with the  sacks.
sentences.chinese: 我们用袋子将夹克和球拍打成小包。

sentences.english: They blew the door off with a small charge of high explosive.
sentences.chinese: 他们装了一小包烈性炸药把门炸掉了。

sentences.english: Bags are often carried by women.
sentences.chinese: 通常都是女人拎着大包小包。

sentences.english: For sure one more pack of chips was better, whatever small pack or large one.
sentences.chinese: 确定一个包薯片是更好的，无论小包装或大的一个。

sentences.english: and the sight of everyone carrying bags bulging with food.
sentences.chinese: 以及人人手里大包小包拎着鼓鼓囊囊食品袋的景象。

sentences.english: Vacuum packed convenience food is easy to cook.
sentences.chinese: 小包装方便食品烹制简便。

sentences.english: There is a parcel of clothes on the table.
The little girl could hardly contain herself for joy when she opened the parcel.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩打开小包一看，高兴得简直不能自制。

sentences.english: Only buy'bad' foods in small packet.
sentences.chinese: 只买小包装的“糟糕的”食物。

definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
bag or purse etc/small bump or pimple/hillock
pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
full and bulging (of a pocket, pouch etc)
